title: Ben Wallace – 2022 Comments on Provision of NLAWs to Ukraine
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ben Wallace, the Secretary of State for Defence, on 8 April 2022.
content:
The UK Government is resolute in our support for Ukraine and determined that no barbaric Russian act goes unanswered.
